transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good evening sir.
Customer: Haan, good evening. Sadab sir.
Executive: Haan, Sadab sir, good evening, boliye.
Customer: Sir, aap sir bola tha ki sir kaam kar rahe the lekin aapne seedha help me dal diya sir uss cheez ko.
Executive: Help me?
Customer: Ji, aap aapne jo whatsapp pe share kiya tha. Haan. Discussion chal raha tha mera tabhi maine usme aapko kuch update bhi nahi kiya tha maine kaha pareshan ho jayega. Whatsapp nahi nahi nahi aapke naam ke upar kuch complaint raise nahi kiya hai na, mai thodi kuch bol raha hu, aap to padh paate honge na. Wo record me rahe bolke kyuki kal agar aapko change kar denge na, ye log mujhe gyan dete hai.
Aapne kuch raise nahi kiya tha to ye kya IndiaMART ka record me rahega. Kal agar koi mere sath game khelta hai na to mai bol sakta hu ki ye ye complaint number pe jaake dekhiye mai dala tha.
Quality of your leads. It's with IndiaMART and me sir, aap worry mat hoiye, aapke naam pe mai complaint nahi kiya hu. Aapka mera understanding.
Customer: Sir, sari add hoti sir meri isme add hoti. Hain? Ji, ji sari meri isme add hoti.
Executive: Are aap kya karenge dekhiye sir, aapko isko to rakhna padega na sir, transparency to maintain karna padega kyuki kya hota hai na, mujhe bina bataye hi manager change ho jate hai CRM.
Jab CRM change ho jate hai to naya CRM aate hai na wo gyan dete hai, sir hame pata nahi hai, aap to bataye nahi hai, kahi pe to record nahi hai. Aur ye aapka mera whatsapp likhane se to wo bolte hai ki sir whatsapp me hame mat dikhaiye.
Samajhte hai na, to isiliye mai dono taraf se dal diya. Ye is cheez ke sir ye cheez ho sakta hai ki agar jaise aapne video se whatsapp pe. Aap usko update kar dijiye na, aap usko update kar dijiye ki haa we discussed we are working on it then I will accept it.
Ho gaya khatam baat.
Executive: Thik hai na?
Customer: Haan sir, wahi cheez hai ab iska sir pura closing aap hi humko dalna padega ki matlab kya kya discussion hua tha kya dikat. Haan. Agar aap dikat thi na. To mai jitni bhi jo aapne bheja tha. To isko uthakar. Kar dijiye. Com. Aur zahir si baat wahi hai.
Executive: Kya hua?
Customer: Agar jo aapne bheja tha iska hum complaint to zahir si baat hai raise karte aur aapko screenshot bhejte.
To jo hum attach karte to ye aapka jo whatsapp me aapne jo share kiya tha na hum usi ko waha pe laga ke attach karte aur uske sath sath wo jo STS me hai usko waha pe update kar dete.
Executive: To in future aap raise karte bol bol rahe hai complaint. Haan. Mai raise karta. To mere raise karne se ye hota hai. Executive: Acha acha acha. To thik hai aage se mai nahi karunga aapko bata dunga. Aap sirf mujhe complaint screenshot de dijiye to ho gaya. Mujhe sirf record chahiye bas utna hi aur kuch nahi.
Customer: Haan sir IndiaMART ke behalf. Mai mai raise karta hu to isse ye hota hai jaise abhi aapne raise kiya. To aapka jo raise hota hai ticket wo mere upar aata hai kyuki mai aapka CRM hu. Haan agar mai raise karta to mai aapke behalf pe raise karta to yaha pe IndiaMART ko hi raise hota. Jo uska department hai usko raise hota.
Executive: Acha acha acha. Thik hai to aap ek aap isko dal dijiye baat ho gaya it was a misunderstanding from customer mai accept kar deta hu aap ek raise karke aap usko aage daliye. Screenshot.
Customer: Haan ab sir aapke paas pata hai kya hai kal ka bhi ek CLM group hai. Feedback ka jo hai mera aur aaj ka bhi dono ka feedback jayega. Aur sir pata hai isse mere upar ye question hota hai ki back to back ticket kyu raise ho rahe hai.
Executive: Acha hmm hmm. Haan mai agar raise karta to ye hota hai ki mai upar aage ke liye raise kar raha hu. To waha pe mujhse questioning nahi hoti kyuki mai raise kar raha hu aapke behalf pe. Ab yaha pe aapne raise kiya hai jo jitne bhi aap ticket raise karenge wo sare mere behalf pe open honge.
Executive: Acha acha aapke upar. Haan aur sir usme ye hota hai agar mai kaam nahi kar raha hu to sir samajh me aata hai ki thik hai mai kaam nahi kar raha hu. Mai A to Z cheez kaam karke aapko screenshot wagera sari cheeze jo matlab possibilities bhi nahi hai wo sari cheeze mai aapko bhej deta hu ki sir dekhiye aap satisfy ho jayiye ki dekhiye maine ye kaam aapka tha maine bola tha ki monday ko kar dunga monday ko mere senior nahi aaye the to mai isko tuesday ko karke aapko maine send kar diya. Acha. Haan thik hai sir koi baat nahi misunderstanding ho gaya aur aap agla baar se nahi hoga aap samjha diye na mai samajh gaya agle baar se aisa nahi hoga.
Customer: Haan kuch bhi aage se hota hai to aap ek kaam kiya kariye aap mujhe bata diya kariye jaise abhi aapka ye whatsapp hai na whatsapp sir mai attach karunga. Thik hai. Pehle discussion ho jaye ki kis department ko ye raise hota hai ticket. Kyuki agar buyleads ka hota to mai buyleads department raise kar deta lekin aapka jo hai call ka dikkat hai call aa rahi hai samne buyer ki. Kuch buyleads. Aur zyada tar calls hai. To wahi cheez hai agar sirf buyleads ka hota to buyleads ka mujhe malum hai mai uss department ko buyleads department ko raise kar deta ki ye kaise verification ho raha hai. Hai call ka sir ek to ek open platform hai open platform me sir koi bhi ab IndiaMART me aa sakta hai aakar apni requirement dal sakta hai. Acha. Haan usme koi foundation aap kar nahi sakte to ab isko confirmation karna padega ye ticket khulega bhi to kiske behalf me kiske liye khulega. Yaha pe alag alag department apna kaam kar rahi hai. Acha. Haan aage se sir aage kuch bhi problem hua kare aap mujhe bata diya kariye waise bhi sir mai aapse 15-20 din me ek mahine me to connect karta hi karta hu. 101% connect karta hu. Thik hai. Aur sir wo jo aap jo category ka jo ticket raise kiye hai black turmeric black ginger wo dono ka ek hi ticket me dal diye. Wo clearly form ka title bol raha hai ki alag alag category ke liye alag alag request daliye. Sir ye uske liye hum log gadbad na ho jaye fir. Hum log hum logo ke paas waha pe confirmation ke liye aata hai na wo sirf ek rehta hai ki waha pe humne dal diya to uske baad hamare paas confirmation ke liye aayega ki kon kon si haa wo. To aap handle karenge. Usko fir hum handle karenge yaha ek hi hai sir usme dekhiye aap and likha hua hai. Haan haan haan. Beech me maine black turmeric powder and black ginger powder. Acha. To waha se aayega to fir hum uske unko kyuki humne sir directly agar aisa hota hai na agar mai usko ek sath dal alag alag dalta hai na to waha se rejection aata hai ya to aapka approval aata hai ab maine usko sir thoda sa zehen se maine kiya maine kaha ek sath dal deta hu to at least unki call aaye mere paas call aakar agar rejection bhi ho raha hai to mai unko explain kar saku rejection kyu kar rahe ho bhai yaha pe searches hai yaha pe buyer hai sari cheeze. Hmm hmm. To aise aise mere paas call aati nahi. Hmm hmm. Aise hokar agar rejection karenge ya kuch karenge to mere paas call karenge bhai tumne do category ek isme kyu dali. Acha. To ispe sir thoda sa meri discussion bhi ho jayega unhe samjha samjha sakte hai. Hmm. Thik hai sir isko mai solve kar lunga I'll take care. Haan isko concern close karke sir mai aapke paas call kar raha hu thik hai. Thik hai thik hai okay thank you. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's ads were put in help section.

- Wants to know why back-to-back tickets raised.

- Wants to know which department to raise ticket.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified he raised complaint on company.

- Executive will not raise complaint in future.

- Executive will accept the customer's request.

- Executive explained the process of raising tickets.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after closing concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, complaint, whatsapp, department, raise
